analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xbc37c4cb2a52ab6fb14210e665f8a8156f565830.sol:
	Contract PajeetCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xbc37c4cb2a52ab6fb14210e665f8a8156f565830.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0xbc37c4cb2a52ab6fb14210e665f8a8156f565830.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
